author: Duplicate bentoylight
post_text: May 15, 2022 at 5:02 PM#1Hi allHere is a very strange behavior that i've never seen before.I create a macro with one line :Setvar $group = (what group ?)I answer 3 in the pop-up.The command line feedback shows me Setvar $group = 3But when i do Listvar i get : $ = $groupand no $group = 3.If I rewrite my command, it works as expected.If i copy/paste my "wrong" command in another macro or in the command line, i get the same $ = $group, as if my sentence is corrupted.Does anybody has encountered this behavior ?Thanks
title: Strange behavior with variable
